entry.string: Unable to retrieve mime type. No filename supplied!
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu retreeefe-a meeme-a type-a. Nu feeleneme-a sooppleeed!

entry.string: Unable to analyze file [#(1)]. Cannot open for reading!
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu unelyze-a feele-a [#(1)]. Cunnut oopee fur reedeeng!
Uneble-a tu seek tu ooffffset [#(1)] veethin feele-a: [#(2)]' , $magicInfo['offset'], $fileName); xarExceptionSet(XAR_SYSTEM_EXCEPTION, 'FILE_NO_SEEK
Uneble-a tu reed (#(1) bytes) frum feele-a: [#(2)].' , $magicInfo['length'], $fileName); xarExceptionSet(XAR_SYSTEM_EXCEPTION, 'FILE_NO_READ

entry.string: Unable to rewind to beginning of file: [#(1)]
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu rooeend tu begeenning ooff feele-a: [#(1)]

entry.string: Unable to read (256 bytes) from file: [#(1)]
entry.translation: Uneble-a tu reed (256 bytes) frum feele-a: [#(1)]
